name: Sherlocked
description:
Play Sherlock Holmes as he races against time to solve riddles and save his close aides.

Sherlocked!

Hii,

We made this game as a partial requirement for the course CSC 582: Computational Models of Interactive Narrative being offered by the Computer Science Department, NC State University.

The course was offered by Dr Chirs Martens in Fall 2021.



The student team that built the game:

  • Ishan Bhatt (ivbhatt@outlook.com)
  • Jayty Jayty
  • Arpitha Vijaykumar
  • Manish Shinde
